title: Annual Summer Hackathon 2025
description: 🏆 Our biggest coding event of the year! 48-hour hackathon with multiple age categories. Amazing prizes, mentorship from industry professionals, and fun activities for the whole family. Teams compete in web development, mobile apps, AI/ML projects, and robotics challenges. Free pizza, snacks, and swag included! Register early - limited spots available.

title: Summer Coding Bootcamp Begins
description: 🚀 Intensive 8-week summer program covering web development, mobile apps, and game design. Perfect for students who want to take their coding skills to the next level!

title: Family Movie Night
description: 🎬 Bring your family for a fun movie night and snacks. All proceeds go to our equipment fund. Featuring tech-themed movies and documentaries.

title: Parent Info Session
description: 📚 Learn about our curriculum, meet the mentors, and ask questions. Perfect for new families interested in joining our programs.

title: Back to School Tech Fair
description: 🎓 Showcase student projects and recruit for fall programs. Open to the community! Student presentations, tech demos, and enrollment opportunities.

title: Parent-Child Coding Workshop
description: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Learn to code together! A fun introduction to programming for families. No prior experience needed.

title: Halloween Coding Challenge
description: 🎃 Spooky-themed coding challenges and costume contest. Create your own Halloween games and animations!

title: Winter Showcase & Holiday Party
description: ❄️ Students present their year-end projects. Celebration with families and community. Awards ceremony and holiday treats!

title: Coding for a Cause
description: 💝 Our students build apps to support local charities. Showcase and support their work! Community impact through technology.

title: Python Workshop
description: 🐍 Beginner-friendly Python programming workshop for new students. Learn the basics of one of the world's most popular programming languages.

title: Web Design Challenge
description: 🌐 Students showcase their web design skills in a friendly competition. HTML, CSS, and JavaScript projects on display.

title: Tech Talk: AI Basics
description: 🤖 Guest speaker introduces artificial intelligence concepts to our students. Learn about machine learning, neural networks, and the future of AI.

title: Game Development Day
description: 🎮 Learn the basics of game development using Scratch and Unity. Create your own games and learn industry tools.

title: Community BBQ
description: 🍔 Join us for a community barbecue and fundraiser. Food, fun, and fellowship! Meet other coding families.

title: Mobile App Workshop
description: 📱 Introduction to mobile app development for intermediate students. Build your first Android and iOS apps.

title: Robotics Demo Day
description: 🤖 Students demonstrate their robotics projects to parents and community. See amazing robots in action!

title: Summer Coding Camp
description: ☀️ Intensive week-long coding camp for enthusiastic young programmers. Daily coding challenges and projects.

title: Tech Trivia Night
description: 🧠 Test your tech knowledge at our fundraising trivia night! Prizes for winning teams and lots of laughs.

title: 3D Printing Workshop
description: 🖨️ Learn the basics of 3D design and printing technology. Design and print your own custom objects!
